title: Three Core Parenting Principles
itunes:author: Guest: Mike Berry
itunes:summary:
Good parenting can always be traced to a healthy relationship with your children. But what does that look like? John and Danny discuss an important key for keeping a relationship strong, even when your child is acting up. Featuring Mike Berry.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Mike Berry's book "Winning the Heart of Your Child" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-10-12?refcd=1170002

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/three-core-parenting-principles/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
